title: dEvi pAdam
sahitya:
dEvi pAdam paNindEn anavaratam varadE para


anupallavi

  kAviyAr nilangaL shUzhum nAgaik-kAyarOhaNEshan
nEyamoDu magizh tUya vadivu koL


caraNam    Ar tuNaippArampA inda ulaginil AdaravAi unadaDiya varaladhanaip-
pArppavar evar pashi tIrppavar evar koDum pAvi enru nIyum taLLi viDAdE
pAdi mati nanmuDi mIdil oLiravaNi pArvati aDiyavar ArvamoDu paNiyum
pAda malarai oru pOdum idaya maravAda varamaruL purAri iDam amarum
